directions: Prepare the pasta according to the package directions and reserve ½ cup of the pasta water before draining the pasta. I just took a 1 cup measuring cup and filled it up with water.
Return the pasta to the pot and add about ¼ cup of the reserved water.
Stir in the cheese and when melted, add in the Greek yogurt, paprika powder, and garlic powder.
If it's too thick for you, add in the remaining reserved pasta water.
Place any leftovers in an airtight container and refrigerate for up to 5 days.
title: Healthier Macaroni and Cheese
